snippet: Legislation that would place licensing restrictions on all seven of Tennessee’s abortion clinics was overwhelmingly approved by state lawmakers Tuesday and sent to Gov. Bill Haslam, who is expected to sign them into law.
abstract: Tennessee lawmakers overwhelmingly approve legislation requiring abortion clinics that perform over 50 procedures a year to be licensed as ambulatory surgical centers; bill will be sent to Gov Bill Haslam.
lead_paragraph: Legislation that would place licensing restrictions on all seven of Tennessee’s abortion clinics was overwhelmingly approved by state lawmakers Tuesday and sent to Gov. Bill Haslam, who is expected to sign them into law.

headline.main: Tennessee: Lawmakers Pass New Rules for Abortion Clinics
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Lawmakers Pass New Rules for Abortion Clinics
